page.title: 13Local Ghost Stories
page.content:
There are three local ghost stories. The first is known as the Grey Lady and is a ghost believed to come from Morley Old Hall and roam the area on certain nights, particularly the eleventh day of the eleventh month. The second is supposed to be the ghost of a maidservant from Morley Hall who drowned herself in a pond in the grounds when she found herself to be pregnant. The third is more recent and is supposed to be the ghost of an American airman who committed suicide while at the hospital during the second World War. All the stories are greatly enjoyed by pupils at the College, especially on dark nights!
